DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy dies, gain #b%d Block and #b%d Dexterity.
The first time you take damage each turn, heal #b%d HP and gain #b%d Strength.
At the end of your turn, heal #b%d HP and gain #b%d Strength.
Draw #b%d card whenever a card is exhausted.
At the start of each turn, lose #b%d HP, then reduce Poisoned by #b1 stack.
